name: Yongwang (regional)
shortLoreBlurb: Yongwang (regional) is a deity/spirit from Korea associated with sea dragon king, storms. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places. Tales link them to tempests and sky-sovereignty. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.

tags: Deity, Serpent/Dragon, Spirit, Storm/Sky, Water Spirit
description: Yongwang (regional) is a deity/spirit from Korea associated with sea dragon king, storms. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places. Tales link them to tempests and sky-sovereignty. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.
